Speedtech Global Inc., the producer of SPEEDWRAP (R ) hook and loop fasteners along with the leading wholesaler of velcro straps, introduces its new Google+ site focused on the Speedwrap and velcro cable tie consumer.

The brand new Google + organization site will serve each casual hook and loop fastener customers at the same time as repeated buyers of each SPEEDWRAP (R ) and VELCRO (R ) brand name fasteners. The local community will present specific deals, free of charge prize giveaways and pro guidance plus much more, all from your “Vel-Perts” (TM ) at Speedtech. Read more about hook and loop fasteners here

Now consumers can share their insight on the many uses for hook and loop fasteners by sharing software strategies, publishing stories and giving comments and thoughts for new products. Present consumers of SPEEDWRAP and VELCRO (R ) model fasteners like a velcro cable tie and velcro straps can use the new Google+ site to acquire special discounts, be the primary to listen to of new goods, obtain distinctive offers and a great deal far more.

To kick off the launch with the new Google+ webpage, when new consumers enroll to ‘”follow” Speedtech’s Google + community “Speedtech Intercontinental Inc” (https://plus.google.com/u/0/b/117830856085636428064/), by June 15th, will immediately be entered to the chance to win a absolutely free SPEEDWRAP Fastener-Fan Pack.

Steve Pope, Speedtech’s Vice President of marketing, feedback “Customers generally tell us they value the truth that we're nutty good enough about a wire management resolution as simple as a velcro cable tie, to get consider the “Vel-Perts” and so they need to share within our strange affinity for these simple-to-use fasteners. We’d wish to listen to the place buyers use Speedwrap hook and loop goods, a Velcro cable tie or Velcro straps, why they use hook and loop fasteners and just how these hook and loop fasteners could be improved? Google + is an excellent destination to do all of this.” Added Mr. Pope, “Just this early morning a future purchaser asked us if other Speedtech clients imprinted their net deal with on velcro straps? I knew the solution was yes, but I required to place this possible consumer in contact with other customers. Using the introduction of our new Google + local community, we will direct shoppers into a put on the internet wherever other ‘hook and loop fastener fanatics’ are inquiring queries, sharing alternatives and accessing particular features.”

Background-
Hook and loop fasteners, such as branded SPEEDWRAP, Velcro straps and VELCRO cable ties are useful for routing, bundling and securing wires and cables. Simply because velcro straps are gentle on wires, easy to use and reusable they can be a preferred wire conduite remedy. A velcro cable tie, cut-to-length reels and back-to-back fashion tape are utilized to route, bundle, protected or manage cords and cables across quite a few apps. A number of the commonest programs for velcro straps consist of telecommunications, facts conversation, electrical, audio & video, photography, recreational and home or office environments.

Using proper terminology for hook and loop fasteners is important. Consumers often refer to hook and loop fasteners as “velcro straps” or a “velcro cable tie” however the proper terminology is “hook and loop fasteners.” If a client is calling out the branded velcro straps, the proper term is “VELCRO(R ) manufacturer straps.”

About Speedtech International, Inc.
Founded in 1994, Speedtech Intercontinental Inc. pioneered the development of hook and loop cable and wire administration items. Fabricating from a newly designed and patented VELCRO (R ) brand name fastening material, Speedtech led the market with innovative bundling, cinching, routing answers using hook and loop. Speedtech's engineering and sales team remain focused exclusively on hook and loop fasteners which includes cable ties, cut-to-length, back-to-back type tape and custom straps for over 15 years. Hook and loop is Speedtech’s entire business. In truth, they have so several velcro cable ties and velcro straps to choose from, which they started a website devoted to these fastening options called TheStrapStore.com. An industry leader, Speedtech can be a growing, customer-oriented organization located in Racine, Wisconsin. For help with material expertise, wholesale pricing, or design assistance - contact Speedtech today.

Speedtech Worldwide, Inc.

Essential Greece vacation guidelines and information

<img src="http://i49.tinypic.com/1g3kv7.jpg"; alt="Santorini" />

Greece and the Greek Islands, for all the history they have witnessed and all the activities that continues to be undiscovered for residents and travelers as well, have grown to be among the world's most significant holiday destinations. Throughout the peak months of ideal weather conditions, happy cheerful faces along with crazy nightlife, tourists frequently outnumber the local people. When travelling to Greece, here are some useful things you need to be aware of.

Arriving in Greece

The overall economy of Greece thrives on its tourism, therefore getting in and out of the country has become streamlined. Generally speaking, residents from the European Union states need no visa to enter or exit Greece. Upon arrival into one of its many airports, passengers are usually separated into Schengen and Non-Schengen travellers, the latter being just like the distinction directed at domestic and international flights.

Although the accepted currency is Euros, it's a good idea to get your cash exchanged at home, particularly for those coming from the US. There are several foreign exchange providers available even at the airports nevertheless the sheer amount of tourists makes this almost impossible to do on your first day.

While many gadgets such as laptops and mobile phones automatically convert to Two hundred and twenty v, make sure you pack a travel charger with unique adaptor units to fit the local standards.

Navigating around

Cabbies across the globe have come to obtain a bad reputation for their profession. This is also true for Greece, perhaps no more than the rest of the world. Taxis are however, especially helpful whenever arriving at an airport or perhaps leaving a hotel. Booking ahead of time will save you the trouble of queuing up for them.

The best modes of transport around major cities are the trains and buses. Tickets are available in many kiosks and stations. A machine validated card stores value at 1 hour 30 minutes which can be validated aboard trains and buses. Do not get caught with no ticket or an unacceptable one. It's not only embarrassing, it may also get quite expensive as well.

The Daily Routine

Tourists in Greece can quickly adapt to the schedule of the locals. In some seasons, it's always best to do your shopping, sight-seeing and travelling in the cooler morning hours from Eight or 9am. From noon to dusk, the temperatures can rise up to such high levels that make heatstroke an extremely real likelihood. Wear light clothing, remain indoors or in the shade during these hours. While visiting the beach, apply a good sunscreen lest you end up being mistaken to be the victim of an assault by orange markers.

Greece is also famous for its untamed nightlife much like other top-notch travel destinations in European countries. At night, the temperatures can fall to extremely comfortable levels that make outdoor dining along with local entertainment a marvelous experience.

When heading for Greece, do book a hotel and lodging ahead. The sudden overflow of tourists can simply leave you in no-man's land. There are quite a number of high end hotels to choose from in Athens and at most well-frequented holiday destinations such as click here as well as Mykonos. They have splendid accommodation, in-house spa and pool areas, or even an eight-page room service selection and a tasty all-you-can-eat breakfast fit for royalty.

There are also accommodations for young adults especially for college students who may have lengthier holidays. Youth hostels are fairly cheap with a dormitory style living quarters and shared bathrooms.

When travelling to Greece, always remember to book in advance, keep safe and enjoy your stay. It is a lovely country and a full week is never nearly enough to relish all that it has to offer. Cheers, to the Cup of Life in Greece.
An interesting resource if you would like to learn more about traveling to Greece: Travelscopemag
